name: Wheelbarrow
description: A wooden machine with a wheel and handles used for transporting goods.

related objects.description: A wooden handcart for transporting goods.
related objects.name: Handcart

related objects.description: A large container used for transporting materials on construction sites.
related objects.name: Dumpster

related objects.description: A tool with a broad blade and short handle for digging and moving dirt.
related objects.name: Shovel

components.name: Wheel
components.description: Circular object that enables the movement of the wheelbarrow.

components.name: Handle
components.description: Long wooden structure used for pushing and steering the wheelbarrow.

components.name: Tray
components.description: The main body of the wheelbarrow where goods are placed.

components.name: Legs
components.description: Supports the tray when the wheelbarrow is not in motion.

components.name: Brace
components.description: Metal support connecting the tray and wheel, providing structural integrity.
